overview: A young bride living in the popular district of Mallasine Hammam-Lif receives a call from her husband, an illegal immigrant in Italy, informing her that he will send her a money order by post. The young woman begins to live her new rich life while her neighbors change their behavior towards her and start treating her like a queen. Good fortune begins to show its face to the bride but will things stay that way or will her happiness be turned upside down?
title: Manda
